memberdef.argsstring: (const char *portName, const char *IPPortName, int maxBuffers, size_t maxMemory, int priority, int stackSize)
memberdef.name: mythen

briefdescription.para: Constructor for mythen driver; most parameters are simply passed to ADDriver::ADDriver.

detaileddescription.para:
After calling the base class constructor this method creates a thread to collect the detector data, and sets reasonable default values for the parameters defined in this class, asynNDArrayDriver, and ADDriver.
portName
The name of the asyn port driver to be created.
IPPortName
The asyn network port connection to the Mythen
maxBuffers
The maximum number of NDArray buffers that the NDArrayPool for this driver is allowed to allocate. Set this to -1 to allow an unlimited number of buffers.
maxMemory
The maximum amount of memory that the NDArrayPool for this driver is allowed to allocate. Set this to -1 to allow an unlimited amount of memory.
priority
The thread priority for the asyn port driver thread if ASYN_CANBLOCK is set in asynFlags.
stackSize
The stack size for the asyn port driver thread if ASYN_CANBLOCK is set in asynFlags.

briefdescription.para: Called when asyn clients call pasynInt32->write().

detaileddescription.para:
This function performs actions for some parameters, including ADAcquire, ADBinX, etc. For all parameters it sets the value in the parameter library and calls any registered callbacks..
pasynUser
pasynUser structure that encodes the reason and address.
value
Value to write.

briefdescription.para: Called when asyn clients call pasynFloat64->write().

detaileddescription.para:
For all parameters it sets the value in the parameter library and calls any registered callbacks.
pasynUser
pasynUser structure that encodes the reason and address.
value
Value to write.

briefdescription.para: Called when asyn clients call pasynOctet->write().

detaileddescription.para:
For all parameters it sets the value in the parameter library and calls any registered callbacks..
pasynUser
pasynUser structure that encodes the reason and address.
value
Value to write.
nChars
Number of characters to write
nActual
Number of characters actually written

briefdescription.para: Report status of the driver.

detaileddescription.para:
Prints details about the driver if details>0. It then calls the ADDriver::report() method.
fp
File pointed passed by caller where the output is written to.
details
If >0 then driver details are printed.

briefdescription.para: Starts and stops the acquisition.
Enables or disables the flatfield correction.

detaileddescription.para: After initialisation the flatfield correction is enabled.

briefdescription.para: Enables or disables the rate correction.

detaileddescription.para: After initialisation the rate correction is disabled.

briefdescription.para: Sets the exposure time of one frame.
Sets the exposure time of one frame.
Enables or disables the flipping of the channel numbering.
Enables or disables the bad channel interpolation.
Enables or disables the gates.

detaileddescription.para: After initialisation the gates are disabled.

briefdescription.para: Number of gates.
Sets the energy threshold for the module.
Sets the energy threshold for the module.
Sets the dead time constant for the rate correction.
Sets the number of frames whitin an acquisition.
Enables or disables the flipping of the channel numbering.
Sets the Trigger Mode 0 = None, 1 = Single, 2=Continuous.
Loads predefined settings for the current module to measure some common x-ray radiation.

detaileddescription.para: The command loads the energy calibration, the bad channels file, the flatfield correction, and the trimbits for the corresponding settings, and sets the energy threshold to a suitable value.

briefdescription.para: Sets the detector back to default settings.

detaileddescription.para: This command takes about two seconds per module.

briefdescription.para: Reads the values of all the modules parameters, sets them in the parameter library.
Get Acquition Status.
Get Firmware Version.
Sends a command to the detector and reads the response.
Send a string to the detector and reads the response.
Driver for sls array detectors using over TCP/IP socket.
